name: stoplight
content:

one of a set of red, yellow, and green lights that control the movement of vehicles, usually at a point where two or more roads join: Turn north at the stoplight onto Route 100. We were waiting at a stoplight when someone rear-ended us.
omersukrugoksu/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesIn an area larger than Rhode Island, there are seven stoplights. A car bomb exploded while the vehicle was waiting at a stoplight at a busy intersection.The systems can alter the frequency of stoplight changes to even out traffic flow.
